website_summaries.verdict: With separate boy/girl designs, this potty seat makes training easier on the go.
pros: One of the smallest on our list, this travel potty folds down extra small
Also comes with a urinal for boys
Can be stored in the car or carried in a backpack
cons: Small enough that larger kids might not fit

customer_reviews.title: Find another solution for on the go potty
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this potty. The handle broke off of ours within hours of taking it out of the box. It is also very small. The "bucket" area is too small. We have a boy, and when he sat on it his pee pee was resting on top of the splash guard. When we tried to get him to scoot back the whole thing became very unstable. Needless to say, I am disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fenner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this potty to keep in the car. I have only had it for a week, but it has already been very useful. My son look to this potty right away, and he loves that he can carry it. The one thing that I really liked about this potty over some of the others my size pottys out there was that this potty has a removable carpartment. It's easy to empty and wash!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This potty chair is the perfect travel size! It fits in the diaper bag, so I don't have to carry it around when we go somewhere. It has a handle on it so my daughter can carry it around. My daughter likes using it. My only critique is the height of the chair when it is in use. My daughter is 15 months old and the chair is a little low for her. It doesn't look as comfortable as a regular potty chair. But if it were any higher then it wouldn't be as compact as it is, which wouldn't be as convenient.
customer_reviews.author: t simon

customer_reviews.title: Good for potty training ad travelling
customer_reviews.text: Its small for a big toddler but so far my son is 2 yr 4 month old and he is small so its ok for him. Its very handy and easy to put under the stroller. His other potty chair is big for him and he is afraid to sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Joed

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful for Potty Training
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! At first I thought it was too small, but my 2.5 year old loves it. She also likes that it folds up and she can carry it by herself. We literally take it everywhere, and it relieves the anxiety of not being comfortable going when we are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: If you are potty training YOU NEED THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell you how many times this thing has made life easy. My daughter is potty trained and we still use it all of the time!!! We keep it in the car. No nasty public restrooms and no porta-potties!!!! We have used this on road trips, at the park (in the car), and at large public events. No emergency stops at a gas station ever, just pull the car over. It is sealed and totally leak proof!!! Also, stink proof, which is very nice. Easy to clean!!! Once I got this, my daughter was potty trained in a week because there were no accidents because I couldn’t find a bathroom in time.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great for emergency potty time for trips
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Had to use it twice with my toddler for emergency bathroom stops on a recent 6 hour trip driving. I thought it was too small but she was able to use it easily. I bought liners so disposal was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Tipps

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY SMALLER than what is pictured!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this seat is DEFINITELY SMALLER than what is pictured!!!! but it works great! seals the seat good after use... no need to worry about leakage. better than others that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: A joke!
customer_reviews.text: This potty is so freakin small! I mean it’s literally for a doll that wets itself or something it’s ridiculous. My boy is doing great on his other at home potty which is standard size but He doesn’t like using big scary public toilets so I thought this would be an good idea. But it’s a joke. Also cheaply made and extremely low to the ground so my son who just turned 3 fell off of it because it is just so akwardly built. And a peice if plastic that sticks out scratched him while he tried to use it. Don’t do it. Spend the money and get a better quality portable potty chair.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Wright

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, convenient, & practical!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a portable potty to keep in our car for our daughter. She actually ended up picking this one out specifically M, which ended up being to the best advantage. It is lightweight and seals very well for when your child does use the bathroom. It’s also easy to clean afterwards. Definitely worth the money spent and makes life so much easier when traveling with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dalton

customer_reviews.title: This is a lifesaver for my granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver for my granddaughters. We put this thing in the trunk and whenever they have to stop on the road while out shopping we just set it in the backseat of a girl no more having to stop at Public restrooms my four-year-old even can use it but little bit small for her but it still works out. I really do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing, only 1 caution
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Not designed for a big kid, but my daughter is small, so this is perfect. Easy to clean & easy to open, close & carry. Only caution is if they are sitting on it for awhile make sure it doesn't stick to their butt when they get up! Luckily my daughter hadn't gone the time it did this, but if she had it would have surely made a mess of my car seat.
customer_reviews.author: None-ya

customer_reviews.title: Great product for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately I like the idea of this product but the seat is too big for him right now and there were a few sharp areas that I had to filed down unfortunately the back has an uncovered latch that hits the back if you try to use it as a back support also when I was cleaning it the rubber ring on the hole cover immediately rolled out of place so maybe when the baby is older in public restrooms but right now it's being used as a training tool at home
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! We use it all the time! My daughter potty trained at 21 months and is now 25 months and it's so much easier to put her on this potty at the park and etc when out and about! It's small and compact perfect for travel! I put it in my stroller to use when I go on my long walks! Used at the zoo etc!! I just find a private area and let her use it and dump it and it seals great !
customer_reviews.author: C53

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This little travel potty has been such a big help for potty training. Being able to take it to a park or really anywhere is great because you don't have to rush to find a bathroom, you can literally open it anywhere (respectfully) and have your kid feel comfortable to use the potty.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena Djukic

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: The baby in the photo must be photoshopped. Our guy is extremely small (4% weight). At 19 .5 months, he can sit on the potty, but I can't imagine a child over 2 fitting on this in any logical way. Hopefully it will work out. Easy to clean and doesn't leak, so at least as a road toilet, it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson is learning potty training. He lives in a two story home with only 1 bathroom located upstairs. Mom leaves the potty at bottom of stairs ready to go. He loves the bright colors and wants to take it everywhere! We wanted him to have a portable potty that was easy, clean and familiar to use on the go. It works great in the van, and also to carry along to places where facilities may not be available.
customer_reviews.author: joyce leavitt

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a game changer!!! I will buy one of these for any of my friends potty training their child! My daughter has a nervous stomach when it came to ISR swim lessons and needed to go to the potty right before... this was clutch! Not to mention, it came in handy on back country roads where there wasn’t a bathroom in sight. Seals up completely and really easy to clean!! My 2yo loved this potty!!
customer_reviews.author: Emry

customer_reviews.title: Small but handy
customer_reviews.text: While this product is VERY tiny, even for my 5th percentile two year old son, I can't deny how handy it is. When driving, you're not always in a place that's appropriate to go potty outside, and if it's bad weather, it's nice to have the option for him to use this in the car. one point taken off for being excessively small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This came in very handy while potty train my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This came in very handy while potty train my daughter many times she would have to go the bathroom when we were sitting in carpool with my son to get out of school. It is a little small so I don't feel like I will be able to use it past four years old but it was definitely worth the money and I'm glad that I had it in my van.
customer_reviews.author: ashley sims

customer_reviews.title: Built for dolls?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what child could actually fit on this. Maybe a 12mo but not one who is of potty training age unless they are in the 5% percentile. You’re better off with the OXO travel potty/seat with the liners.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Graham

customer_reviews.title: One of our most highly used items!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these potties with my last son and it was one of our most highly used items. We practiced elimination communication (EC) so he potty trained at a very young age. It is difficult to find a good size potty to use for little bums, but this one does the trick. Great to use from tiny babe size up through toddler years. And easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Love

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this travel potty for our 3 yr old son who is potty training and it was too, too small. There is no splash guard for boys so you will definitely be cleaning up messes after each use. Pros. Locks stays in place, the pee bucket is easy to lift out (wish there was a better handle to grab, but still good). Will return for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: Picture misleading but it works
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. The picture is misleading on size. It is quite small. My 2 yr old fits pretty comfortably. My 4 year old just fits on it. I’m not expecting to get many more months out of it for her. Generic disposable bags work well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small Even baby girl did not like it Took it camping Long car rides Did not work for us I left it at a campsite Someone will take it
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great for road trips and more!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product for road trips and even for a bad day in traffic when your kid just can’t hold it. It contains the odor well too if you have to travel for awhile before being able to dump it out. If your kid is super tall, this may be a bit low/short for them but still should work. Would totally recommend this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: BKN

customer_reviews.title: its super small, my one year old fits on it ...
customer_reviews.text: extremely lightweight and cacn flip over. this picture with this girl, isn't accurate, its super small, my one year old fits on it but that girl in the picture looks bigger than one and she is sitting on a bigger potty then the one shipped to me. that is not actual size!! Its cheaply made, like flimsy. not sturdy The lid broke off after a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Seems to seal everything tightly which is very important;) but SUPER SMALL!!! Like about the size of a cd... and smaller than the potty seats you put on the regular toilet for children... the potty is overall about the size of a large lunchbox.. I guess that's good if you need something that doesn't take up much space? Not sure it's my favorite but I guess it gets the job done sort of?
customer_reviews.author: JamieRee

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training on the go.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is potty training and has recently become afraid to sit on public toilets ( too tall, noisy, etc) I love this potty it is easy to tote around. I love that it has a lid in case I am unable to dump the pee right away. One thing I didn't like was that the lid doesn't stay up like in the picture when open other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney S.

customer_reviews.title: A dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: I love this potty! It was just what I needed!We took it with us on our cruise vacation. I didnt have to worry about my 22 month old being uncomfortable using a different toilet she wasnt use to.We also use it for everyday trips to the store or when visiting others.
customer_reviews.author: pamela f.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: My three year old has sensory processing disorder and refuses to use public restrooms. This potty goes everywhere with us. It is small but she still fits it just fine. It’s small enough to fit in my jujube be light tote.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Good but flawed
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as described. Subtracted a star because the clear plastic insert has rubber stoppers that continually come off since the first time I took it out of the box. It’s very annoying & worries me that it may not keep urine in. Haven’t put it to the test yet as we’ve simply dumped it out each time prior to transporting it
customer_reviews.author: LYCollins

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little potty! As a matter of fact, my daughter thinks it's so cool she prefers it over her regular potty the plays music! We took it on vacation and it was perfect for stops in the car and in the hotel room. We still keep it in the car just in case. Easy to carry and pack and doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but a bit small for a 2 1/2 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This potty seals well so is good for using out and about since it doesn't leak even when full and closed, but it is so small that it is very difficult for my son to not spray everywhere when using it. He is taller and skinnier than average. We still keep it in the car for emergencies, but take him to a real bathroom if we can find one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Barto

customer_reviews.title: Nice n small for short potty trainee, seals well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for short kid....I'm referring to like an 11inch inseam. Update: both hinges have broken, it's plastic but has been treated well and not dropped or banged around...was hoping it would last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was small, but my child sat on it comfortably and finds it easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best for potty training
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most necessary thing for potty training My daughter loves it and it’s easy for me to take her everywhere while she’s being potty trained
customer_reviews.author: nooshinlw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the back of our SUV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the back of our SUV. We use it several times a week. Appears to have a very secure seal for preventing leakage, however, I haven't tested it because I dump the urine out before closing the lid. Only thing I don't like is how low to the ground it is. My daughter is 2, and to me she looks slightly uncomfortable because she is squatting so low, but she doesn't seem bothered at all by it. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: AJmomma

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy
customer_reviews.text: My concern in looking for a travel potty was sanitary. Additionally, my 2 year old is tiny 25 lbs and would fall in a normal toilet. Its great on the go. This is very easy and even she can carry it. The one thing is you must set it up against a wall because the back flops open and does not stay erect. Usually you have to use it in a disabled or family bathroom to have room for that.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ka

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, less-than-stellar build quality
customer_reviews.text: The potty is useful for on-the-go movement, but we've had to replace ours after a month due to a hinge breaking (therefor making it impossible to 'seal'). The hinges are pretty weak. The cost point didn't make it too bad to replace, but obviously that can happen only so many times before it's moot.
customer_reviews.author: People person

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: The potty is EXTREMELY small for my two year old. Barely any room for her poop and her pee splashed back. It was not a comfortable experience that my toddler refuses to sit on it. Set us back on the potty training process.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a trip to Disney world worked great to use in place of public restrooms. Simple to operate, easy to clean and helps avoid the dirty public restrooms. Also doesn’t look like a portable potty.
customer_reviews.author: Snowman

customer_reviews.title: Served the purpose!
customer_reviews.text: We were going on a long road trip and my daughter was anxious about having an accident. This was ordered last minute and it still arrived on time! And, it did come in handy when needed! This is a good size also. I could put it on the floor of my sedan (while parked!) and my daughter was able to use it without a problem. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky P

customer_reviews.title: It does job and he likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. It is small but it is about the size I want to carry for travel. It is not really comfy but it does job. Whole point of this product is emergency situation for trip. My son ask me carry this potty chair when we go out. So I’m satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M Estabrook

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: It is small. But I would say its still worth it. I tried it knowing my child is very tall for their age and it is a life saver. I love it , my husband loves it, the whole family loved it honestly it just made potty training so much easier
customer_reviews.author: Emirrow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small travel potty but it works great for my petite 3 yr old. we used it for a week on vacation in the car and at family's house. easy to clean and I did not experience spills like other reviews mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hazlewood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small, portable potty chair, we had read other reviews so we knew this and appreciate that feature! She is only 18 months old so it's PERFECT for leaving in the car. Might not work for a bigger kid, but it's perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: B. Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Which I’m glad. That’s what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The potty is definitely smaller than pictured. Which I’m glad. That’s what I wanted. Easier to tote around. This potty is amazing! It has worked great for our “emergency potty”. My 3yr old daughter was having pee accidents. Little tinkels in her undies. And it was bc she thought the potty was too far away. We went to the beach and I pulled it out and let her pee really fast. Driving a long distance. Stopped and sat the potty in our seat. Keeps her knowing we only go in the potty. She doesn’t pee out of the seat. And it’s easy to clean. Definitely wish I had this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for early potty training
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible tool for potty training and for avoiding accidents on the go. My 18-month-old loves carrying it around and is happy to use it in places where she wouldn't be comfortable using a full-sized toilet.
customer_reviews.author: salsaman

customer_reviews.title: Potty training
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who is learning to potty train. It’s compact in size and easy to take along. I leave mines in the car so we can use it if she needs to go when I’m running errands, park or at my boys baseball games. I also buy the potty liners/bags for super easy clean up. My only wish is that I would want it just a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Lam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome potty!
customer_reviews.text: This potty is awesome! It allows for ease of traveling with a 22month-3 year old. They can be fear free of public toilets, you don’t have to carry just the seat in a plastic bag around, and scurry to a bathroom! It comes in handy in urgent moments. We have not had any problems thus far with leaking, it holds quite a bit of urine and a very large bm. Thank you for this invention!
customer_reviews.author: Jess C.

customer_reviews.title: good qualtiy and convenient but small
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and nicely built, easy to pack and carry around. But one caveat - it is really small potty, I would say it fits comfortably for children under 2 years old. We bought it for 2.5 years old and it is already too small for him.
customer_reviews.author: jmart

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a Mom on the go that’s still potty training or has little ones. I love this!!
customer_reviews.author: lydia banks

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy I’ve gotten on amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and omg SO handy. Area for butt is sort of small but my toddlers still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kids potty!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver especially potty training a two year old! Very convenient and I suggest everyone to just keep one in your car just Incase.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This potty is very convenient. My daughter cannot wait till we find a potty so we carry this one with us. It is very small and fits in my back pack or I hag it on our umbrella stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetos

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves using this definitely necessary when you are potty training good size and good quality too
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use portable potty
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE being able to have a potty that seals for our car trips or even our daily errands including the soccer field. It is perfect for us and great for the potty trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easily portable and my daughter absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny, easily portable and my daughter absolutely loves it! She carries it around with her like a lunchbox. Sometimes it's the only one she wants to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dina A. Douty

customer_reviews.title: Soo incredibly handy
customer_reviews.text: Could be my favorite kid purchase of all time. Perfect for anywhere. Great ergonomics for number 2. My gal is fairly small though. Other reviews mention the size as an issue. I personally think it would be a life saver regardless.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fite

customer_reviews.title: This is hands down the best baby product I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best baby product I have ever bought! It made potty training so much easier because our Lil one was able to pop a squat anywhere and everywhere. We still don’t leave home without it even though she is fully trained now because we line in nyc and rather than her having to sit on public toilets everywhere she’s able to use her clean and personal toilet everywhere. We even bring it on the plane w us so she doesn’t have to use the airplane toilets. This thing has been a life saver
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: I love this little travel potty
customer_reviews.text: It's very practical to have in the car. I have a 25 month old that has been using it for about a month. It's small, but it is a portable potty, it has to be small. It doesn't spill. It contains the odor. It's perfect for my toddler
customer_reviews.author: Liz Zubieta

customer_reviews.title: Works great & it’s small but easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this potty! It makes it so much easier to travel with a toddler that is potty training. It does not leak & if you add a gel insert or a liner to the bottom of it there’s more room for repeat usage on along trip. I highly recommend parents buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Germ Saver
customer_reviews.text: We keep it in the car for when we need a quick potty or there aren’t the cleaniest potties around. Our three year old calls it the “truck potty “
customer_reviews.author: cassi

customer_reviews.title: Great to have!
customer_reviews.text: Great to have when traveling, especially if someone doesn't have a potty at their place.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and convenient if your kids are already potty ...
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than I thought. My daughter is average sized and not yet two , it was too small for her. Super cute and convenient if your kids are already potty trained. Too hard to learn with this size.
customer_reviews.author: stephalive

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Must have for your little ones on the road or just in case a emergency while being out my daughter love it I like the fact I can have peace not worrying to rush to a rest room while on the road
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. Need to be wary of the seal, which comes off for cleaning. If not put back on securely, the potty will leak when put on its side.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was this product meant for a human or a doll? i brought this for my 2 year old daughter. The toilet is so tiny it doesn't fit her bottom all the way. It's very unstable. I'm certain there are better ones out there. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Owais

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The best potty training seat I purchased for my daughter. She enjoyed the comfort of the seat and we enjoyed how easy it was to transport this product. The added bonus is the cover that holds in liquid and solid waste until you can properly dispose of it.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: my grand daughter just loves it and takes it with ...
customer_reviews.text: my grand daughter just loves it and takes it with her when she is riding in the car. she is 2 years old it helps with her potty training
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. I keep it in the back of our SUV. Very handy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KH CA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has came in handy so many time. Well worth your money, easy clean up and does not leak. Great for long trips or even short trips.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Broke off the hinges
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product end of January of this year and it came off the hinges the end of August. Overall I have got exceptional use out of it for my now 3 year old. It's convenient especially when traveling. I have purchased another
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Small and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely uncomfortable for my 20 month old son to sit on because of how small it is. Also, too small for him to sit on and aim properly into the bowl that he ends up making a mess. In order for it to work, his bottom is almost completely off the back of the potty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good , easy to carry , I only whisper it was a bit bigger. My toddler love it!
customer_reviews.author: raf

customer_reviews.title: Travel without fear!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the newly potty- trained! Took my fear out of traveling because the little potty is never far away.
customer_reviews.author: k2

customer_reviews.title: easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gag gift for my brother in law , but my nephew now has it and both him and his mom love it . easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight easy for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever, my daughter is fully potty trained so when we travel to the stores or wherever I keep it in the car, has saved us numerous times
customer_reviews.author: andrea rivas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect works well when toddler have to go they have ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect works well when toddler have to go they have to go quick.We take it every where we go. Small enough to fit in the stroller as well.
customer_reviews.author: reina abeyta

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend anyone with small children to get this for traveling
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has one for her car and we have the grand kids a lot. Would highly recommend anyone with small children to get this for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But when he got this potty he loved it and started carrying it around like a toy ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is very emotional yet insistent about potty training. It is hard and I am worried about the stress on him with his emotional development. But when he got this potty he loved it and started carrying it around like a toy and he sty clean as it seals well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for potty training
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for potty training. We leave it in the back of our SUV for those times when we are out running errands or camping and not near a restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: You neeeeed this !
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had these for my other children when they were young ! Lifesaver !!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Mora

customer_reviews.title: it does not leak its perfect to have for days
customer_reviews.text: so handy to have for kids who are potty trained. it does not leak its perfect to have for days out
customer_reviews.author: Barrry Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but on the small size.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed product. Nice deep well with sealing lid. All fits together as a unit. Works well for my 3 1/2 yo girl, who is at the bottom end of the growth curve. Giving it 4 stars since it would have been even better if they made it ~20-40% bigger than they did.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Just began potty training and I purchased this item in hopes to use on the go but it leaks! Due to the mix reviews I thought I give it a shot but now I've confirmed that this item is a waste of money! It deserves a negative star rating but that option is not available!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo G.

customer_reviews.title: But if you need something in the car I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is compact. It is for sure small but it can be used by my toddler 3 yo 34lbs with no missing. I will say I don't dare turn it on the side with liquid in it. It is obvious that it does not seal completely. Tried once with just little wash water and dripped. But if you need something in the car I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HAZZ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The potty is cute and seals good. The picture makes it look big, but it’s very very small.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: This is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is must have item if you love to trevel with kids! Especially camping! With this ONEDONE portable potty, it makes me so much easier. Sealed perfect. No smells at all even if my kids pooped. Im bring this in my car everytime and anywhere. Highly recomand!!!
customer_reviews.author: saelyn kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice potty for baby
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my early trained baby. I saw the comments saying it is small and it is indeed perfect for our 9 months old. It is not super sturdy so be careful when your little one moves around. But otherwise nice product. (I haven't tried the cover for transportation though).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome potty chair, every parent in the world needs this chair period.
customer_reviews.author: joseph dematteo

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel but it’s really too small
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel but it’s really too small. Wish they make these bigger. My daughter is small for her 2.5 years (24#) and she’s too big for this potty already.
customer_reviews.author: Pisey

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny portable potty. Toddler can carry it with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks too easy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to have a portable option for pottying, unfortunately the handle broke within a few days of receiving it: the potty is still usable but definitely not as easy to carry around now.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Long

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller then expected my two year old couldn't even use it as it was too small
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing potty
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for traveling for on the go easy to clean my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Azemina Balic

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. So convenient when potty training and for my 4 year old when we need to go. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love that she can sit on this potty chair instead of going to a public bathroom if we are out.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cento

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, practical for travel and very hygienic, my child can use it anywhere, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Martha Tello

product_meta.title: ONEDONE Small Portable Potty for Toddler Travel Outdoor Toilet Squatting Potty for Baby Potty Training (Girl)
feature_bullets: [PORTABLE DESIGN]: The small portable potty is easy to carry and store, providing a clean and convenient urinary device for toddlers at any time and any place
[AGE for TODDLERS] : Please be aware that the size is suitable for babies under 2 years old. The baby potty measures 9" × 9.9" ×4.1". Please check the size before purchase.
[PREMIUM MATERIAL]: Made from the Eco-friendly PP material, safe and harmless to baby's skin
[CUTE COLOR]: Colorful design is proven to encourage successful potty training on toddlers
[EASY TO CLEAN]: It is very easy to clean because part of the potty is easy to take out. Can be reused after cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars253 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
